body_html: Deploying to embedded systems is definitely in the roadmap. Absent a proper Bazel toolchain for the M7, the easiest path is to modify the provided makefile. I think the M7 doesn't have NEON support, so you'd also need to change the code in kernels/*.cc to use either reference ops or neon-free versions. We are hoping to make this process easier in the future.

body: Deploying to embedded systems is definitely in the roadmap. Absent a proper Bazel toolchain for the M7, the easiest path is to modify the provided makefile. I think the M7 doesn't have NEON support, so you'd also need to change the code in kernels/*.cc to use either reference ops or neon-free versions. We are hoping to make this process easier in the future.
